page.title: 19THE BORSTAL IN HATFIELD
page.content: In May 1983 "The Borstal" at Hatfield was renamed Hatfield Youth Custordy Centre.The owner,the Governor and Head Warden is Mr.Elvy.The Y.C.C. disciplines young offenders who have commited crimes,such as theft,burglary and car taking.The time spent in care is from 4_12 months.At the centre in the past the sentence was 6_24 months.The offenders are from Manchester,Lancashire,North,South and West Yorkshire,Humberside and Doncaster.There about 176 inmates this includes 36 discipline officers,4 Governor grades,administration staff(teachers,instructors,2 hospital staff,2 p.e.teachers and 2 caterers).At the Y.C.C.for part of their daily duties,the lads are put on training courses:painting/decorating,mechanics, multi_skills and brick laying.
